Abhi to sirf ultraviolet wale ke design lab mein üòÇ .This is a prototype. 
Prototype smajh aata hai kya hai ?  
Matlab ek hi bani hai aur yeah concept stage pe hai abhi.
 Ispe kam se kam 1 saal work karegi 2-3 team real life scenarios wale jiske baad isme changes honge taki yeh asli road pe chalne layak ban sake. Uske baad pre production mein jaayegi jaha iski fir se range and stress testing hogi for durability as per the specs,fir clearance fir production. 
Matlab 2027 tak market mein available ho jaayegi.
